summary: Completed comprehensive testing of F1 Betting application. Backend APIs are fully functional with 20/20 tests passing. Frontend loads correctly with working theme/language toggles, navigation, and core functionality. Some minor UI interaction issues with registration/login forms due to overlay interception, but core features are operational.

ui_bugs.issue: Button clicks occasionally intercepted by overlay elements, requiring force clicks

passed_tests: Backend API - All 20 endpoints working (auth, drivers, races, bets, leaderboard, settings, admin)
Homepage loads with correct title and hero section
Navigation between pages (Home, Races, Leaderboard, Admin)
Races list displays correctly with 3 race cards
Leaderboard shows users with points and rankings
Admin panel accessible with all tabs (drivers, races, users, bets, settings)
Settings page allows changing app title and hero text
User authentication and profile management working
Seed data populated correctly with drivers and races
